import { useContext } from "react"; import { translationMemoryContext } from "../TranslationMemory"; const GameStats = () => { const translationMemoryStore = useContext(translationMemoryContext); const startTime = translationMemoryStore?.startTime; return ( <>
Game Results Summary
Total number of words/phrases Phrases.length
Total Incorrect incorrect counter
Total Time minutes?
) } export default GameStats;
